author: Jake Baldino
description:
EA (Electronic Arts) is officially selling to private equity in a record-breaking $55 billion deal. What does this mean? Is this bad? Will games be canceled? How long will it take?  I consulted a professional smart lawyer person - Taylor Bartholomew, Partner at Troutman Pepper Locke. 

~~SOURCES & REFERENCES~~

https://arstechnica.com/gaming/2025/09/its-official-ea-is-selling-to-private-equity-in-55-billion-deal/

https://www.nytimes.com/2025/09/29/business/dealbook/electronic-arts-buyout-jared-kushner.html

https://www.pcgamer.com/games/fps/ea-reportedly-expects-battlefield-6-to-bring-in-100-million-players-a-number-that-even-dice-devs-dont-think-is-feasible/
title: the EA Situation is crazy
